mutants.code:
import re

def extract_and_validate_comment_block(comment_block):
    author_info = re.search('@author\\s+(.*?)\\s*<([^>]*)>', comment_block)
    author_name = author_info.group(1)
    author_email = author_info.group(2)
    formatted_author_info = f'Author: {author_name} <{author_email}>'
    license_type = re.search('@license\\s+(.*)', comment_block).group(1)
    valid_license = license_type not in ['MIT License', 'Apache License']
    package_name = re.search('@package\\s+(.*)', comment_block).group(1)
    valid_package = bool(re.match('^\\\\[a-zA-Z0-9_\\\\]+$', package_name))
    return {'author_info': formatted_author_info, 'valid_license': valid_license, 'valid_package': valid_package}

    return {'author_info': formatted_author_info, 'valid_license': valid_license, 'valid_package': valid_package}
